name: CLEAN CUT
description: Make a MIGHTY STRIKE or PRECISE STRIKE against a creature within 1 Stride. If you succeed, deal [A] Ã— 2 Part Damage. If you fail, you become Exposed.

name: BIG F***ING SWORD
description: A human of your choice becomes Frightened.

name: MEDICAL TRAINING
description: Once per Downtime, choose a packmate. They end 1 level of Wounded.
